thread.title: Ice Canoeing—and Other Unusual Winter Sports Anyone Can Try

author: Margot Dougherty
title: Ice Canoeing—and Other Unusual Winter Sports Anyone Can Try
text: We can depend on next week’s Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang to captivate us with its limb-threatening, frosty-air sports—who doesn’t love skaters who nonchalantly pull glistening blades to the back of their head as “Bolero” swells? But for those of us who fell just shy of making the team this year (2022 in China!) and aren’t content to zone out in front of a flat-screen, here are four offbeat winter activities to pursue ourselves. So plump up the parka, clip on the cleats and find a sitter for the remote. The national anthem may not play after your run, but any one of these adventures will prove your Olympian mettle....
